detail_desc: Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, ties at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.

Trainers in imitation suede with decorative plastic beads and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, long raglan sleeves, a rounded hem and short slits in the sides.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with contrasting colour sections and buttons down the front.
Mules in shimmering imitation leather with pointed toes. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Cardigan knitted in soft cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, decorative front pockets, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Padded ski jacket in wind- and water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge and hook and loop tab at the back. Waterproof zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, a snow flap with press-studs and reinforced elastication at the waist, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded ski jacket in wind- and water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge and hook and loop tab at the back. Waterproof zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, a snow flap with press-studs and reinforced elastication at the waist, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Ski trousers in wind- and water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a fly with a concealed zip and button. Detachable, adjustable braces with a hook and loop fastener. Elastication at the back of the trousers. Snow flaps and reflective hook and loop strips at the hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Ski trousers in wind- and water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a fly with a concealed zip and button. Detachable, adjustable braces with a hook and loop fastener. Elastication at the back of the trousers. Snow flaps and reflective hook and loop strips at the hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. Seamless.

Padded ski jacket in wind- and water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge and adjustable hook and loop tab at the back. Waterproof zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, a snow flap with press-studs and reinforced elastication at the waist, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded ski jacket in wind- and water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge and adjustable hook and loop tab at the back. Waterproof zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, a snow flap with press-studs and reinforced elastication at the waist, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams. Zip fly and press-stud, a zipped front pocket, a reflective strip on one leg and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Adjustable, elastic braces with a hook and loop fastening. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams. Zip fly and press-stud, a zipped front pocket, a reflective strip on one leg and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Adjustable, elastic braces with a hook and loop fastening. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. Seamless.
Turtleneck jumper in a soft, textured knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and high slits in the sides.

Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8x-12xY), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and a smocked seam under the bust.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and a smocked seam under the bust.

Long blouse in woven fabric with a wrapover V-neck for easier nursing access, decorative gathers on the shoulder seams and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam under the bust with a narrow tie belt. Unlined.

Long blouse in woven fabric with a wrapover V-neck for easier nursing access, decorative gathers on the shoulder seams and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam under the bust with a narrow tie belt. Unlined.
Short kimono in soft viscose and cotton jersey with lace sections on the shoulders. Wide, short sleeves with lace trims, concealed ties at the waist and a detachable tie belt.
Calf-length skirt in jersey crêpe with concealed elastication at the waist and a sewn-in wrapover and knot detail at the front.
Fabric-covered, USB 2.0 charging cable with decorative sparkly stones. Suitable for iPhones 6/7/8 Plus/X. Length 1 m. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.
Chino shorts in a cotton weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Smartphone case in faux fur with an imitation leather lining, three card compartments and a larger note compartment. Press-stud fastening.
Baby Exclusive. Turban in a double layer of soft cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front and elastication at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Turban in a double layer of soft cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front and elastication at the back.
Fancy dress costume in velour with a zip down the front, a hood with appliqués, a faux fur mane and tail and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fancy dress costume in printed jersey with long sleeves, long legs and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a dress in an organic cotton weave and pair of tights in a knitted cotton blend with the cotton content being organic. Dress with buttons on the shoulders and a seam with pleats at the top. Tights with an elasticated waist and jacquard-knit feet.
Short, V-neck dress in sturdy jersey with decorative lace details at the top, short sleeves, a seam at the waist and A-line skirt. Unlined.
Soft pile slippers with embroidery on the front, elastication around the tops, terry inside and soft, imitation suede soles.
Short jacket in mesh with large sequins, long sleeves and no buttons. Jersey lining.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lacquered finish. Stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets with a concealed zip. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and elastication and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline that has a small opening and a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with slits and ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbing at the cuffs.

Short, V-neck dress in jersey crêpe with visible seams at the front, narrow shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the back, one pair of which can be tied. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short, V-neck dress in jersey crêpe with visible seams at the front, narrow shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the back, one pair of which can be tied. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Long-sleeved top in pile lined with soft fleece. Hood with a wrapover front, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with embroidered text. Shawl collar with a button at the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam with a drawstring under the bust, side pockets, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, printed jersey with a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, printed jersey with a gently rounded hem.
Mittens in woven fabric with pile sections and elastication at the wrists. Size 2-6M without thumbs. Fleece lining.

Dress in striped sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

Dress in a patterned weave with a frilled collar, gathered yoke and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Checked Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
